name: Ted Hoffman
text: We ordered a pickup order from the Leesport Pizza Hut take out location. It was delicious!

name: Nathan Strause
text: I ordered delivery and they turned me down and made me come pick it up. They also didnâ€™t have crucial menu items in stock. Very disappointed. Most likely wonâ€™t go back.

name: Rich Robinson
text: Ya know being a over the road trucker I've ordered pizza hut all over the country and this one has to be the best I've ever dealt with their fast and hey the pizza is almost too hot to eat at first and the people are very nice two thumbs up

name: Jason Szilli
text: Absolutely terrible pizza and service. Barely any cheese on pizzas.

name: Wilkin Diaz
text: Ordered twice from this location service is very good food is extremely hot ! Never had any issues way better then the Pizza Hut location on north 5th street !

name: Magdalena Dorota
text:
Nothing to write home about...
Pizza was edible but nothing special , wings the same way . After 2hrs waiting for my order  , I  expected little more and the food was almost cold. The delivery person was very nice and that is why they are getting 3 stars from me

name: Robert Foote
text: Thank you so much for excellent pizza and the special delivery yesterday!  My Vietnam buddy was so excited to see your birthday wishes on the pizza box that he is saving the box cover! Tell all your employees 'Thank You'.

name: Nate Whitehead
text: The pizza was good, but getting it delivered is easier.

name: Brigitte Todd
text: I am satisfied with the delivery, friendly staff, food was fresh n warm. I would recommend deliveries as they were prompt and courteous.

name: Jarod Yakaitis
text: Pizza was just ok, other locations are better. The Wing Street wings were also just ok. It seems like this location has gone down hill.

name: Michael Shade
text: Luv their pan pizza... c:

name: rosie blough
text: Bad custom service! Manger dose not have good phone skills!!! Will not return to this Pizza Hut again!!

name: Lori Godlewski
text: The staff is robotic and it's dark inside. Additionally, pizza is on the greasy side & meat toppings add oil so although tasteful, hard on heart & health.

name: Joseph Pilat
text: Customer service was a little bad felt like I was being an inconvenience. For pizza hut pizza it was one of the better tasting that I have found and as with all the pizza chains pricing was good

name: Ann Civil
text: We got the pretzel crust and it was not good. The whole slice tasted like salt and it was not enjoyable and slices were too small. Congratulations, you played ya self.

name: Scott Lutz
text: I love Pizza Hut can't get enough of the pizza they deliver also in Leesport Pennsylvania

text: your pizza is too small and i like waffles
